hotels.name: Downtown Chain Hotel
hotels.notes: Walkable to Market Square. Expect event parking rates.

hotels.name: Airport Area Hotel
hotels.notes: Often has staffed desks 24/7; good for late arrivals.

rentals.notes: Book early; verify parking, house rules, quiet hours, and cancellation terms. Target neighborhoods: North & South Knoxville, Fountain City, Bearden, Sequoyah Hills.

camping.name: Riverside Campground
camping.notes: Reserve ahead; check gate hours and quiet hours.

camping.name: State Park Campground
camping.notes: Limited hookups; beautiful setting; verify dump station.

planB.notes: Often has late-night desks; good last-minute option.
Tourism area—availability varies and rates can surge.

tactics: Expand your search radius 30–90+ minutes along I-40/I-75.
Call properties directly for late cancellations after evening cutoffs.
Be flexible on room type and rate; confirm parking & late check-in.
Airport-area hotels (TYS) are often staffed 24/7 for late arrivals.

food_247.title: 24-hour diners & breakfast
food_247.note: Classic diner chains; reliable for groups.

food_247.title: 24-hour fast food (varies by location)
food_247.note: Look for Waffle House, IHOP, McDonald’s 24h, some Taco Bell/Cook Out late-night.

food_247.title: Travel centers & convenience (food & restrooms)
food_247.note: Pilot / Flying J, Weigel’s—many have hot food, snacks, coffee 24/7.
